Texts.Eng:
Nomadic tribal hunters. Low-tech, but capable of understanding technology with minimal training.
    
Diet: Omnivore 
 
^orange;Perks^reset;: 
+^green;7^reset;% speed, +^green;6^reset;% Jump
Resist: ^green;10^reset;% Physical, ^green;40^reset;% Poison 
Tech: ^green;Hunter's Claw^reset;
 
^orange;Environment^reset;: 
Gain additional vitality, jumping and speed in ^green;Rainforest, Jungle, Savannah, and Primeval^reset; biomes 
    
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Bow: +^green;15^reset;% Damage 
Mace: +^green;25^reset;% Stun Chance
Dagger: +^green;15^reset;% Damage, +1% Crit Chance
Spear: +^green;25^reset; Max Health, +^green;15^reset;% Protection
    
^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
^red;50^reset;% Shadow, Knockback Resist, -^red;20^reset;% Energy
